# collectionNames

**Instance Property**

The names of the currently loaded font collections.

## Declaration

```swift
var collectionNames: [Any] { get }
```

## Related Documentation

- **fontDescriptors(inCollection:)**: Returns an array of the font descriptors in the specified collection.

## Properties

- **applicationOnlyMask**: Makes the collection available only to the application.
- **delegate**: The font manager’s delegate.
